titles: Bishop Overall's convocation-book, MDCVI concerning the government of God's catholick church, and the kingdoms of the whole world.
author: Overall, John, 1560-1619.
Sancroft, William, 1617-1693.
notes: Edited by Archbishop Sancroft. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library and Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Imperfect: copy at Union Theological Seminary Library lacks ports.
